text: Phostria bistigmalis is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Embrik Strand in 1913. It is found in Tanzania and Zimbabwe.Afro Moths ==References== *Maes, 2014. Notes on the Crambidae of Africa with new synonyms and combinations (Lepidoptera Pyraloidea Crambidae). Lambillionea CXIV, 2, 2014: 139-143 Category:Moths described in 1913 Category:Phostria Category:Moths of Africa
title: Phostria bistigmalis
